content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to current information on research programs that may be actively recruiting undergraduate researchers at the University of Alberta. However, I suggest you visit the University of Alberta's website for information on available research programs, or you can reach out to the relevant faculty members or program coordinators directly to inquire about potential opportunities. You may also check for undergraduate research opportunities on websites such as UAlberta's Undergraduate Research Initiative, which provides a platform for faculty members to advertise research project opportunities. Additionally, you can contact the Career Centre and Centre for Student Involvement at the University of Alberta for more information on research opportunities.
